 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַץ‎</span>] **verb** probably ==be smooth, slippery== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slip***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ מַהנִּֿמְלְצוּ לְחִכִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.103|Ps 119:103]] ***how smooth*** (agreeable, pleasant) ***are thy words to my palate*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדְּבַשׁ לְפִי‎</span>).
